numlitem.para: Lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE remains OFF, and
Associated Pack Flow Control & Shutoff Valve is secured closed.
Carriage of animals and perishables in associated lower cargo compartment is prohibited.
Increase flight plan fuel by 0.6% due to 2 packs operating in HI FLOW Mode.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to associated Pack selector "INOP – OFF" and PACK___FLOW CONTROL AND SHUTOFF VALVE INOP CLOSED". Install Placard adjacent to Lower Lobe CARGO COND AIR FLOW RATE selector on Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) INOP OFF. Placard adjacent to affected pack selector switch "ACM INOP". Enter items in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
